DOC.brief_summary: Comparison of malignant and non-malignant disorders associated bone marrow hemophagocytosis.
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Analysis for Patients With Hemophagocytosis in Bone Marrow
DOC.detailed_description: This is a retrospective study comparing malignant and non-malignant disorders associated bone marrow hemophagocytosis. The medical record of patients who had documented evidences of hemophagocytosis in bone marrow are reviewed. The clinical and biological characteristics are compared according to the underlying disorders of hemophagocytosis.
DOC.criteria: patients who had evidence of hemophagocytic histiocytosis in bone marrow aspiration and biopsy patients who did not evidence of hemophagocytic histiocytosis in bone marrow aspiration and biopsy
